name: OptionGroup_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the OptionGroup class.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithSingleOption
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with a single option.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithMultipleOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with multiple options.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithLongOption
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with a long option.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithNoOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with no options.
